title: No addition to or alterations in a building shall be carried out without the previous written permission of the Collector
clause_text: No addition to or alterations in a building shall be carried out without the previous written permission of the Collector.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
